rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open space with floor-to-ceiling windows along the North-facing side to maximize natural light and ventilation. Includes eco-friendly materials, energy-efficient design features such as LED lighting, smart sensors, and large glass panels that also serve as insulation.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space with built-in desk and shelving for storage, positioned away from direct sunlight but still benefiting from natural light. It integrates sustainable materials and eco-friendly insulation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact yet modern kitchen designed for minimal waste, featuring energy-efficient appliances and natural stone countertops. It is integrated with the dining area to create a seamless transition.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: spacious bedroom with eco-friendly features such as natural ventilation, floor-to-ceiling windows for optimal daylighting, and built-in storage. Ideal placement according to Vastu is the West or South-West.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom / Family Room
rooms.description: A multi-purpose room serving as a guest bedroom and shared family space, designed with modular furniture to adapt to different needs. It is oriented for calmness per Vastu.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated area for home entertainment, featuring soundproofing and optimal seating arrangement. The design respects Vastu by placing this room on a North to East axis, ensuring minimal noise interference.

openings.name: North-facing Entrance
openings.description: Primary entrance on the north side to welcome positive energy, as per Vastu guidelines. It is designed with security features and ample natural lighting.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows integrated throughout the design to allow maximum daylight while maintaining energy efficiency.
